law.catch_line: The Department shall enter into an agreement with the Potomac River Fisheries Commission to establis...
law.text: The Department shall enter into an agreement with the Potomac River Fisheries Commission to establish oyster seed areas in the Potomac River from Cornfield Point to Point Lookout for the purpose of propagating seed oysters to replenish natural oyster bars in Calvert, Charles, St. Mary's counties, and other areas of the State.
